Translations.Text: Ni kre human ni kon ki li flustr himself. Ni est closer al him than his jugular vejn
recording (angxel) je dekstr je las constantly recording
Ne utterance does li utter vigl witness
Finally inevitable coma death ven; this est ki vi pen evade
Korn blov; this est promes tag
Cxiu anim ven kun herder witness
Vi uz est oblivious al this. Ni tuj remove your vual; hodiaux your vizi est as fort as sxtal
companion dir Here est my formidable testimony
Jxet into Gehenna cxiu stubborn disbeliever
Forbidder charity aggressor plen de dub
Li set DI another di. Jxet him into severe retribution
His companion dir Our Lord mi ne mislead him; li est far astray
Li dir ne feud Me mi suficx avert vi
Nothing sxangx nun. Mi est neniam unjust towards popol
Est tag when ni pet Infer Hav vi hav suficx Gxi dir Don me plur
Paradise ofert righteous readily
This est ki promes cxiu repenter steadfast
Ili reverenced plej Gracious en their privacy ven wholeheartedly
Enter gxi pac; this est Tag Eternity
Ili get anything ili wish therein ni hav eben plur
